Field.DisplayName: Do you remove it from the NT version output?
Field.Description: Parameters marked with ○ are excluded in the NT version package.

Field.DisplayName: Is it a debug parameter?
Field.Description: Parameters marked with a circle are excluded from all packages (because they are for debugging).

Field.Description: When indoors, the SFX specified by "Weather SfxId (Outdoor)" and "Wind SfxId (Outdoor)" in "Weather Parameter.xlsm" will be invalid in the cutscene.

Field.DisplayName: Do you want to apply the MapGD local ID to the weather Gparam?
Field.Description: Do you want to apply the mapGD local ID changes to the cutscene weather Gparam as in the in-game? ([GR] SEQ30194)

Field.DisplayName: reserved1
Field.Description: reserved1 ver4-> 5 64-> 96

Field.DisplayName: Local ID overwrite for weather Gparam MapGD
Field.Description: Overwrite the ID used for cutscene weather Gparam (-1: No overwrite. MapGD local ID during cutscene playback is used). If "Do you want to apply MapGD local ID to weather Gparam?" Is x, it is not referenced.
reserved1 ver4-> 5 64-> 96
